text: Nahakki namitta leiba ujao adu nahakna uba ngamdraga, ‘Ichin inao, nahakki namitta leiba u-makup adu ei louthokpige’ haina nahakki nachin nanaoda nahakna karamna haigani? He, aphasasinnabasa! Nangna ahanbada namitta leiriba ujao adu hanna louthokkho, adudagidi nahakna nachin-nanaogi mittagi u makup adu louthokpada sengna uba ngamgani.”
